doc:
Mary Beth Hurt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Beth_Hurt 0 Mary Beth Hurt (born September 26, 1946) is an American actress of stage and screen. She is a three-time Tony Award-nominated actress.Notable films in which Hurt has appeared include Interiors (1978), The World According to Garp (1982), The Age of Innocence (1993), and Six Degrees of Separation (1993). She has also collaborated with her husband, filmmaker Paul Schrader, in such films as Light Sleeper (1992) and Affliction (1997). Mary_Beth Hurt ( born September_26_,_1946 ) is an_American_actress of stage_and_screen . She is a_three-time_Tony_Award-nominated_actress.Notable_films in which Hurt has_appeared_include Interiors_(_1978_) , The_World According to Garp_(_1982_) , The_Age of Innocence_(_1993_) , and Six_Degrees of Separation_(_1993_) . She has_also_collaborated with her_husband , filmmaker_Paul_Schrader , in such_films as Light_Sleeper_(_1992_)_and_Affliction_(_1997_) .
